sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import { getPokeId, getPokemons } from "../../Components/Redux/Actions" import { useEffect } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min" export default function Detail() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {id} = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getPokemons(id)) },[dispatch,id]) const selectorID = useSelector((state) => state.detail) return(
Nombre : {selectorID[0].nombre.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + selectorID[0].nombre.substring(1)}
ID: {selectorID[0].id}
Tipo : {selectorID[0].tipo.map(t => t.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + t.substring(1)).join(' - ')}
Vida:{selectorID[0].vida}
Defensa: {selectorID[0].defensa}
Ataque: {selectorID[0].ataque}
Velocidad:{selectorID[0].velocidad}
Altura: {selectorID[0].altura}
Peso: {selectorID[0].peso}
) }
